Wine Taster.description: Evaluates wines for taste, aroma, and quality.

Comic Artist.name: Comic Artist
Comic Artist.degree: Bachelor's in Fine Arts or Illustration
Comic Artist.description: Creates illustrations and artwork for comics and graphic novels.

Software Engineer.name: Software Engineer
Software Engineer.degree: Bachelor's in Computer Science or Engineering
Software Engineer.description: Develops and maintains software applications for startups.

Data Scientist.name: Data Scientist
Data Scientist.degree: Master's in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Data Scientist.description: Analyzes data to inform business decisions and strategies.

UX Designer.name: UX Designer
UX Designer.degree: Bachelor's in Design or Human-Computer Interaction
UX Designer.description: Designs user-friendly interfaces and experiences for software applications.

Growth Hacker.name: Growth Hacker
Growth Hacker.description: Focuses on innovative marketing strategies to drive user growth for startups.

Music Producer.name: Music Producer
Music Producer.degree: Bachelor's in Music Production or related field
Music Producer.description: Oversees the production of music recordings and manages the recording process.

Sound Engineer.name: Sound Engineer
Sound Engineer.degree: Bachelor's in Audio Engineering or Music Technology
Sound Engineer.description: Manages audio equipment and ensures high-quality sound during recordings.

Composer.name: Composer
Composer.description: Creates original music scores for films, games, and other media.

Music Teacher.name: Music Teacher
Music Teacher.description: Teaches music theory and performance to students of various ages.

Session Musician.name: Session Musician
Session Musician.degree: No formal degree required, but proficiency in an instrument is essential
Session Musician.description: Performs music for recordings and live performances as a hired musician.

Textile Designer.name: Textile Designer
Textile Designer.degree: Bachelor's in Textile Design or Fashion
Textile Designer.description: Creates patterns and designs for textiles and fabrics.

Buyer.name: Buyer
Buyer.degree: Bachelor's in Fashion Merchandising or Business
Buyer.description: Purchases clothing and accessories for retail stores.

Fashion Photographer.name: Fashion Photographer
Fashion Photographer.degree: Bachelor's in Photography or Fine Arts
Fashion Photographer.description: Captures images for fashion campaigns and editorial spreads.

Diplomat.name: Diplomat
Diplomat.degree: Bachelor's in International Relations or Political Science
Diplomat.description: Represents a country's interests abroad and manages diplomatic relations.

Foreign Service Officer.name: Foreign Service Officer
Foreign Service Officer.degree: Bachelor's in International Relations or related field
Foreign Service Officer.description: Works in embassies or consulates to manage diplomatic missions.

Policy Analyst.name: Policy Analyst
Policy Analyst.degree: Master's in Public Policy or International Relations
Policy Analyst.description: Analyzes policies and provides recommendations to policymakers.

International Relations Specialist.name: International Relations Specialist
International Relations Specialist.description: Studies global issues and advises organizations on international policies.

Immigration Officer.name: Immigration Officer
Immigration Officer.degree: Bachelor's in Immigration Law or related field
Immigration Officer.description: Processes immigration applications and ensures compliance with immigration laws.

Office Manager.name: Office Manager
Office Manager.degree: Bachelor's in Business Administration or Management
Office Manager.description: Oversees daily office operations and manages staff.

Procurement Officer.name: Procurement Officer
Procurement Officer.degree: Bachelor's in Supply Chain Management or Business
Procurement Officer.description: Manages purchasing processes and vendor contracts for office supplies.

Sales Manager.name: Sales Manager
Sales Manager.description: Leads the sales team and develops strategies to meet sales targets.
